ComicInfo.Summary:
Flesh Garden!: Flesh defeats aliens and the champion of King Mong but refuses to return to Earth.
MAD Reader!: Portraits of MAD readers.
Murder the Husband!: A man murders his lover's husband but also manages to sink the rowboat he and the husband are in.
Murder the Story!: Humorous rescripting of a crime story.
Dragged Net!: Parody of the crime television series, Dragnet.
ComicInfo.Tags: Flash Gordon,Dr. Zarkov,Ming The Merciless,Dale Arden
ComicInfo.Writer: Al Feldstein,Bill Gaines,Harvey Kurtzman,Harvey Kurtzman,Bill Gaines,Al Feldstein
ComicInfo.Title: Flesh Garden!; MAD Reader!; Murder the Husband!; Murder the Story!; Dragged Net!
